home.resume: I'm a young lover of technology, with experience developing web pages. Press the button below if you want to know a bit more about me.
about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: My name is Facundo Iglesias, i'm from Buenos Aires - Argentina. I have experience developing web pages using HTML, CSS, Javascript and working with technologies like React.js, Tailwind.css & Node.js.
